<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unarchives a specific group."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/groups/{groupid}/unarchive"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Unarchives a specific group.

--

**Permissions:**
`Teacher, Admin, SuperAdmin (Consumers)`

**Events:**
`GROUP.UNARCHIVE [success, error]`


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"Organization ID of the group","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"groupid","in":"path","description":"Unique identifier of the group","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token required for authorization","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request body for unarchiving a group. Currently, no parameters are needed.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"required":false}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
